ISSUE.TITLE: [DS-155] Maven war plugin changes cause war to include libraries as well
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION:
Imported from JIRA [DS-155] created by mdiggory

Maven War Plugin had changed name of property for excluding resources from the packaged war artifact.
